text: ING Group, or just ING is a world wide financial company. ING started in the Netherlands. ING offers banking, investments, life insurance and retirement services. ING means: Internationale Nederlanden Groep. It is a member of Inter-Alpha Group of Banks. == History == The first bank of ING Group was founded in 1743. Then it was established in 1989 after the merger of NMB Postbank Groep and Nationale-Nederlanden. == References == Category:Banks of Europe Category:Companies of the Netherlands
title: ING Group
